news-item.title: WATCH LIST Stocks to watch on...
news-item.text: WATCH LIST Stocks to watch on the Australian stock exchange at the close on Thursday: " LEI - LEIGHTON HOLDINGS: down 34Â¢, or 1.5 per cent, at $21.90. The board of construction and contract mining group Leighton has supported an improved offer from its majority shareholder Hochtief for a greater stake in the company. Leighton has also terminated the employment of chief executive Hamish Tyrwhitt and chief financial officer Peter Gregg, in line with Hochtief's request to make various changes to Leighton's management and board. " ORG - ORIGIN ENERGY: down 17Â¢, or 1.2 per cent, at $14.39. Origin Energy has suspended drilling at 12 rig sites in south-east Queensland as it investigates an asbestos contamination incident. " RRL - REGIS RESOURCES: up 14Â¢, or 5.6 per cent, at $2.65. Gold miner Regis Resources has blamed higher production costs for a 32 per cent slump in first half profit. " TRS - THE REJECT SHOP: up 36Â¢, or 3.5 per cent, at $10.65. The managing director of discount retailer The Reject Shop has resigned after more than four years in the role. AAP
